name: The Bitter Mimosa
description: There's serious potential for the mimosa outside of girly-drink territory. With a base of grapefruit juice and sparkling wine, this drink becomes much more complex and savory with a dose of Cynar.
recipeIngredient: 3 ounces freshly squeezed pink grapefruit juice from 1 to 2 grapefruits

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the Cynar then the grapefruit juice into a Champagne flute. Top with sparkling wine. Serve immediately.
